page.title: 12AMESTREY VILLAGE HALL
page.content: The Village Hall is registered charity 520932 and is owned by a trust of local people but run by a committee appointed at an Annual General Meeting open to the community. It provides a meeting place for such organisations as the Women's Institute,Parish Council, Parish Church Council etc for regular meetings, jumble sales, fetes, Harvest Suppers etc. The local branch of the {Hereford and Radnor Nature Trust}meets monthly in the winter and evening classes are held. The Commitee organises fund raising events- dances, prize bingo, whist drives to meet running expenses and the Hall is also hired out (lower terms for locals) for parties weddings etc. The Hall was recently decorated inside and outside by the{Leominster {District Community Programme.
